definitions.definition: One of the small drupe-like subdivisions which compose the outer layer of certain fruit such as blackberries or raspberries .
examples: It is best to pick the berries while all drupelets are of a consistent, dark red coloration.
The passengers on the chock-full boat were packed across the deck like drupelets .

main_definition: ( botany ) One of the small drupe-like subdivisions which compose the outer layer of certain fruit such as blackberries or raspberries . [from mid 19th c.]
